pages.text: The Dendritus is a special block which can be found placed under Dispatchers by Vagrants. It applies Phasing to all parasites in range of it, causing them to permeate through most blocks. The effects strengthen with the stage of the Dispatcher.

$(#630000)This block also entirely prevents parasites from breaking blocks in range of it. I should probably set one up with a Dispatcher wherever I plan on settling. Fast.$(br)If I don't feel like placing it manually, I should be able to just give it to the Dispatcher, which can place it on its own.

The Dendritus is entirely reliant on its host Dispatcher for nutrients, and as a result it will become inert if separated for an extended period of time. Vagrants can, of course, interact with it to reconnect it if it is directly below another Dispatcher.
